name: Bird Photography
description:
A little gift game submission to the Secret Santa Jam!

Nature is coming back to the Exclusion Zone, and it's up to you, the Photographer, to document the avian wildlife that's flourishing in it. Take a stroll through the overgrown forests as you gently guide the birds to get the required shots you need.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move character

Arrow Keys - Move camera

Space - Take Picture

R - Restart Level

CREDITS:

TOOLS USED: Godot, Aseprite

MUSIC: Launchable Socks (@launchablesocks) - "Car Jam"
SFX: SoundJay.com, 99Sounds, Kronbits (@kronbits)

FONT: Compass Gold by somepx (@somepx)
